message.body: We need to pick you up where we dropped you off. Where are you?
Coming
Go up the sidewalk towards the main street. We are at the corner
Just walk uphill along the red brick buildings.
We are parked 90 degrees to the side walk just before the Main Street
We are facing the drove of people walking uphill

I transferred $50 to your card. Let me know if there is a problem. Also did you give the remedy and the hotline number to Gabe yet? I am assuming you will once you get settled in the place. Please let me know as soon as you do that.
Okay. Love you.
Me too
Don't worry I am not going to contact you everyday. Just touching base: did you arrive at the place? Did you give Gabe the stuff ? Please also give him our numbers? OK? Waiting for confirmation
Not there yet
Are you still on the road ?
Does your cactus need watering? Is everyone hung over already? I am doing this until you respond to my initial Questions about Gabe...hahaha
Yeah everything's fine and I feel fine. I think maybe give the cactus a little bit of water?
I know you feel fine. I just want you to confirm that Gabe has the remedy in his possession and the telephone numbers of the hotline and both parents. Please confirm.
Yes it's fine
Are you alive?
Yes I'm fine stop worrying about me!!
I love you. I miss you. I watered your cactus. أخ قربونش برم من
But you don't have a book to read!
Yes I do. Now stop harassing me!
